column5: I just bought a new truck and my temp. plates will be valid for one month. What are the polices on crossing the border with temp. (paper) tags? I'm sure I'll get stopped, but I just don't want to get there and be surprised.Thanks in advance,

You might want to have everything. Paper work from dealer and all paper work for registration and for state reg. Then you should be covered. This happen to me in 76 and they looked at the dealer papers and made sure it was reg. and insured make sure you have a canadian insurance card from your agent.
